title: mdmd config
description: Configuration for the mdmd CLI. Located at $XDG_CONFIG_HOME/mdmd/config.yaml (default: ~/.config/mdmd/config.yaml). Override path via MDMD_CONFIG_PATH env var.

collection.description: Absolute path to the note collection root (e.g. Obsidian vault). Overridden by MDMD_COLLECTION_PATH env var or --collection flag.

ingest-dest.description: Collection-relative subdirectory where ingested notes are placed. Defaults to 'inbox'.

symlink-dir.description: Name of the symlink directory created inside each linked project directory. Defaults to 'mdmd_notes'.
